text: Map of Massachusetts House of Representatives' 8th Norfolk district, 2013. Based on 2010 United States Census. Massachusetts House of Representatives' 8th Norfolk district in the United States is one of 160 legislative districts included in the lower house of the Massachusetts General Court. It covers parts of Bristol County and Norfolk County. Democrat Lou Kafka of Stoughton has represented the district since 1991. Candidates running for this district seat in the 2020 Massachusetts general election include Andrew Flowers. ==Towns represented== The district includes the following localities: * part of Mansfield * Sharon * part of Stoughton * part of Walpole The current district geographic boundary overlaps with those of the Massachusetts Senate's Bristol and Norfolk district and Norfolk, Bristol and Plymouth district. ===Former locales=== The district previously covered: * Norwood, circa 1927 * Weymouth, circa 1872 ==Representatives== * Lot W. Bicknell, circa 1858 * Nathaniel Shaw, circa 1858 * Elias S. Beals, circa 1859 * Daniel Lovell, circa 1859 * Charles W. Seavey, circa 1888 * Elijah Baron Stowe, circa 1888 * Frederic W. Kingman, circa 1920 * Frank D. McCarthy, circa 1951 * Andrew H. Card, Jr., circa 1975 * William Richard Keating, 1979–1985 * Marjorie Clapprood, 1985–1991 * Louis L. Kafka, 1991-current ==See also== * List of Massachusetts House of Representatives elections * Other Norfolk County districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 9th, 10th, 11th, 12th, 13th, 14th, 15th * List of Massachusetts General Courts * List of former districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives ==Images== 1908 Louis Flye Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Louis Flye Frank G Allen.png|Frank Allen 1923 George Frederick James Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|George Frederick James 1935 Frank Coughlin Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Frank Coughlin 1945 Frank McCarthy Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Frank McCarthy 1953 William Nourse Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|William Nourse 1967 Daniel Rider Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Daniel Rider Reagan Contact Sheet C46711 (cropped).jpg|Andrew Card SenatorKeating.png|William Keating 1995 Louis Kafka Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Louis Kafka ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Ballotpedia * (State House district information based on U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey). * League of Women Voters of Sharon-Stoughton * League of Women Voters of Westwood- Walpole-Dedham House Category:Government of Norfolk County, Massachusetts Category:Government of Bristol County, Massachusetts
